桱字的基本解释

桱
jìng
床前几。
一种树，木材像杉木而比较硬：“旧怜杉桱碧，新喜荔枝红。”
把丝梳理成经线的工具。

桱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìng］
［《廣韻》古定切，去徑，見。］
木名。似杉而硬。

桱字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桱； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页527第03
【唐韻】【集韻】古定切【正韻】居慶切，?音徑。【廣韻】桱木似杉而硬。　又【類篇】經絲具。　又【集韻】堅靈切，音經。【說文】桯也。東方謂之蕩。

桱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
桱字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
jìng
The bed.
A kind of tree, the wood is harder like fir: "Old Lian Shan Yanbi, Xinxi Lychee Red."
A tool for combing silk into warp threads.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìng］
["Guangyun" ancient fixed cut, go to the path, see. ]
Wooden name. It's as hard as a tree.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桱; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 527 03
[Tang Yun] [Jiyun] Ancient Dingqie [Zhengyun] Juqingqi,? Sound path. [Guang Yun] The wood is like a cedar but hard.　[Classes] warp thread tools.　[Jiyun] Hard and Spiritual, Sound Classics. [Said the text] 桯 also. The East is called a swing.
